metadata.description: Official plugin marketplace for The Cat Toolkit - Vibecoding plugins for autonomous AI development.

plugins.name: bootstrap
plugins.description: Toolkit Infrastructure - Initializing and repairing the system itself. Includes meta-builder and plugin management skills.

plugins.name: execute
plugins.description: Act Phase - The execution engine where file modifications happen. Includes director, worker, and architect personas.

plugins.name: guide
plugins.description: Guidance Phase - Prompt engineering mechanisms for steering agents. Includes prompt library and engineering skills.

plugins.name: persist
plugins.description: Memory Phase - Making ephemeral context permanent through session state. Includes scribe agent and context engineering.

plugins.name: reason
plugins.description: Orient & Decide Phases - Strategic thinking and analysis without action. Includes brainstorming and deep analysis skills.

plugins.name: verify
plugins.description: Validation Phase - The immune system verifying correctness of changes. Includes security audit and type checking.
